quiz_questions.instruction_text: You are developing a solution using Azure Functions and Kubernetes. You must secure your application by using an AAD account that has full access to all namespaces of the Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) cluster. What are two ways you can achieve this?
answer_options: Use an existing Azure AD principal and register the principal in Key Vault
Create a Service Principal with a ClusterRole binding
Enable Managed Service Identity (MSI) in the Azure Function
Create an Azure AD role to allow access to all namespaces
quiz_questions.answer: Enable Managed Service Identity (MSI) in the Azure Function
